His song “My My My!” was a #1 hit on the Billboard Dance Chart, and his […] The post Episode 279: Troye Sivan appeared first on Song Exploder.
author: Tiger Biskup
excerpt: Troye Sivan breaks down his song "One Of Your Girls."
text: Skip to content “One Of Your Girls” Troye Sivan is a singer and songwriter from Australia. He’s been nominated for a Golden Globe, two Grammys, and he’s won four of Australia’s ARIA awards. His song “My My My!” was a #1 hit on the Billboard Dance Chart, and his third album, Something to Give Each Other, was one of Billboard’s picks for the best albums of 2023. Troye’s also an actor; he was in the HBO series The Idol, which figures into the story that he tells about this song. Troye came to the studio and we talked about how he made one of his big hits, the song “One of Your Girls.” For that song, he worked with two of his longtime collaborators: his frequent songwriting partner, Leland, and producer Oscar Görres. You can buy or stream “One Of Your Girls” here. Illustration by Carlos Lerma. For a transcript of this episode, click here. html:
Skip to content

“One Of Your Girls”

Troye Sivan is a singer and songwriter from Australia. He’s been nominated for a Golden Globe, two Grammys, and he’s won four of Australia’s ARIA awards. His song “My My My!” was a #1 hit on the Billboard Dance Chart, and his third album, Something to Give Each Other, was one of Billboard’s picks for the best albums of 2023. Troye’s also an actor; he was in the HBO series The Idol, which figures into the story that he tells about this song. Troye came to the studio and we talked about how he made one of his big hits, the song “One of Your Girls.” For that song, he worked with two of his longtime collaborators: his frequent songwriting partner, Leland, and producer Oscar Görres.

You can buy or stream “One Of Your Girls” here.

Illustration by Carlos Lerma.

For a transcript of this episode, click here.
